caption.p: Time series of annual air temperature recorded at meteorological stations close to each study site. The dots and the solid lines show temperature observations and running mean of 3 year, respectively. Sources of data: http://www.dmi.dk/laer-om/generelt/dmi-publikationer/2013/ for Greenland (Gl), http://www.yr.no/place/Norway/Troms/Troms%C3%B8/Troms%C3%B8_observation_site/climate.month01.html for Tromsø and http://www.yr.no/place/Norway/Nordland/Flakstad/Lofoten/climate.html#year for Lofoten observations. Grey background indicates the time period of available A. nodosum growth data in the area. For Aasiaat, A. nodosum growth was measured at two stations and both time periods of growth measurements are indicated (Qeqertarsuaq: dark grey; Kronprinsens: light grey)
